cmp: 以 (to use/according to/so as to/in order to/by/with/because/Israel (abbrev.))
mng: wife or senior concubine of husbands older brother (old), elder sister (old)

exm.mng: sisters-in-law (old), various concubines of a husband (old)
Si Wenming, personal name of Yu the Great 大禹[Da4 Yu3]
Baosi, concubine of King You of Zhou 周幽王[Zhou1 You1 wang2] and one of the famous Chinese beauties
